body:
Hello @percevalve! Thanks for submitting the PR.

 - In the file [`scripts/tests/test_validate_docstrings.py`](https://github.com/percevalve/pandas/blob/b2cd0faba67b42b5aa0ce5b18a33f0859f404b07/scripts/tests/test_validate_docstrings.py), following                are the PEP8 issues :
> [Line 560:80](https://github.com/percevalve/pandas/blob/b2cd0faba67b42b5aa0ce5b18a33f0859f404b07/scripts/tests/test_validate_docstrings.py#L560): [E501](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E501) line too long (82 > 79 characters)
